item.title: Google introduces Firebase Studio, an end-to-end platform that builds custom apps in-browser, in minutes
item.description: Devs and non-devs can use the cloud-based, Gemini-powered platform to build, launch, iterate and monitor apps, APIs, backends and frontends.

item.title: Google’s new Ironwood chip is 24x more powerful than the world’s fastest supercomputer

item.title: Google’s Agent2Agent interoperability protocol aims to standardize agentic communication
item.description: Google's agent interoperability protocol Agent2Agent aims to standardize communication between agents from different frameworks.
